bibl.title: Recycled Demosthenes.
bibl.note: The front of the papyrus roll containing the so-called "Herpyllis Romance", P. Dublin Inv. C verso (= Pack2 2621) is taken up by an account bearing the titulature of Trajan. In a corner, a piece from another papyrus has been patched in. It contains section 126 from Demosthenes' "Against Meidias". First cent. AD.
bibl.seg: The front of the papyrus roll containing the so-called "Herpyllis Romance", P. Dublin Inv. C verso (= Pack2 2621) is taken up by an account bearing the titulature of Trajan.
